author: Lady Lotus
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2019
review_content: These are the single best pair of headphones I have ever used in my life. They are bulky, strong, soft on the ears, beautiful, top quality for the dollar.The sound: It does not oversell the surround sound, you will hear everything from every direction as if you were in the battlefield of the badlands. The quality of sound is beautiful as well, not muffling or diluting despite size, crisp and fresh. Noise cancellation? You'll be able to hear enough outside to make sure no one is going to play a game of SAW with you but give you peace of mind. Want more control of volume? No sweat, it comes with a small volume wheel.The mic: Wonderful work of art. Ignores outside sounds (except mechanical keyboard clicks of a certain type, those are loud.) You will be heard clearly, you will be clearly understandable and able to communicate with the most effect compared to other headsets, and is good at making sure only you are heard. Need to insta-mute that mic? It comes with a button that turns it off before anyone can hear what's going on.How does it feel? It surrounds and cups the ear, instead of pressing tightly against the tips and giving those horrible headaches. It gives your ears breathing room and the protein foam for the top of your skull is so pleasant that you can easily forget it's even there. The mic is comfortable to move around without getting in my way. Out of mind, the only thing you'll focus on is the sound blessing your ears. Want to wear it for three days in a row in your chair without visiting the bathroom and having a system of snacks and drinks at your desk for that ultimate WoW session? Go right ahead, it won't feel any different than when you put it on to begin with.Will they break easily? NO. These things are built like tanks for your skull, if you drop it, it will brush it off and laugh at the poor attempt to even crack it. This thing might even be a good tool for self defense with how strong it is, these aren't poor quality materials.How does it look? It looks like you're about to perform an impossible feat on your new favorite game. It's beautifully designed, has a red glare that will bring fear into your fellow gaming buddies when you hear their every breath in the game. They are equipped for any situation, they are scary to be against, and highly fashionable to show off and brag to your fellow gamers on Twitch and Steam. They are thick, but that makes this beast seem even bigger and more dominating than those sad little Skullcandy mobile headphones.What can I use it on? If it has either a USB port or can take those little round plugs, congratulations, this works on it. PC is what I use it on, but if I wanted to I could use it on any other single device a gamer could ever imagine using. Even old systems take this beast and let them in, it is perfect.Price vs Quality: Anything that claims to be better will either be a liar or something extraordinarily developed and thus be very costly. This competes with other more costly "top rated" headphones. This packs the features, the looks, the comfort, and the durability all for a considerable price that anyone would be right to simply choose this on first sight. I almost was a foolish mortal and thought about others, but no, I made the right choice to take this set and buy it. If it ever breaks I will be surprised and heartbroken. It has improved everything in my games, I cannot possibly appreciate any headphones more than this.You will regret not knowing what beauty is here before you by buying some lame headset for more of a price, because I feel very comfortable that this one will certainly out compete it without a SINGLE QUESTION. Buy it sooner than later, TREAT YOURSELF. I will be getting another for my brother without a doubt.
title: The mic is perfect

author: Matthew Sawhill
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2019
review_content: Throughout this review, keep in mind that I'm comparing this headset to my brother's $100+ headset. People usually start with the pros, so here are the cons first:CONS:1.) Your ears get warm playing for any length of time which I'm getting used to. In comparison to my bro's headset, the earcups around the ear don't even touch your ear, giving ventilation to the ear to keep it cool.2.) It's wired, which isn't a bad thing necessarily, but the wire is just over 6 feet in length and can get caught on things when you're moving it. Maybe the long wire would be good for the XboxOne (IDK), but for the Playstation 4 all you need to do is plug it directly into the controller, and it automatically connects to the system, so you'd only maybe need half the length that they give you. My bro's headset is wireless.That's it for the cons, as for the pros:PROS:1.)  Comfortable. It's heavily padded around the ears and the top of the headset where it rests on your head. I've worn this for 5 or 6 hours straight, and it still felt extremely comfortable. My bro's headset is similarly comfortable, maybe slightly better, but not by much.2.) The sound is great. My brother's headset claims 3D sound with amazing clarity, but in comparison, I've found that there isn't a great difference (if any!) with this headset and his own.3.) The microphone works crisp, even though I only sometimes hear echos of myself through other people's TV's, I've told they're clear by other players.4.) I've only owned this headset for two weeks, but feels well made, and you can definitely tell they built it smart, even though there's a lot of hard plastic covering the expensive materials, it's sturdy. However, if I were to compare it with my bro's headset, there would be a measurable difference between the two in weight and materials used (on the outside). Like I said, the inside seems like the best part (which is the part that matters, I believe).So, if you're looking for a $28 dollar headset, then get this one. If you're wanting to spend $100+ dollars on a headset, you can find some marginally better in almost every way. Just depends if you want to spend another $80 dollars, or if you want to get a good quality product from a seemingly smart respectable company.
title: It's a better product than you'd expect for the price

author: Leonardo R.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2019
review_content: The product complies with everything the manufacturer promises and the following aspects can be highlighted:1. The headset is quite comfortable, the material of the pads is very soft, which allows them to be used for a long time while the game is going on.2. The headset aid is made of excellent materials, which makes it very robust.3. The cable is long enough, and the volume control gives the user a lot of freedom to raise or lower the volume quickly when needed, without having to pause the game or get too close to the console or PC.4. The maximum volume it provides seems appropriate for long gaming sessions, since the idea is to enjoy the game and not damage the ears.
title: Excellent headset, are made to last.

author: VLT
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2019
review_content: to keep it short and simple, I play on the Xbox one, I have had zero issues with this headset, no issues or interference conveying my voice or hearing others in a chat, the 50MM magnets work well and I can turn the volume plenty high, and I trust this cable to last, this has been an outstanding value for the $25, I do not see a reason to choose a more expensive headset unless you are more concerned with picking out your style.
title: Solid purchase for xbox one use,

author: Anthony S
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2019
review_content: Purchased these because my other headset wasn't working and after reading the reviews on these, I said what the heck. I received them Sunday night and so far they are excellent. The sound quality is really good and the noise cancellation is awesome. They are pretty comfortable as well although they do feel a tad bit heavy but I'm sure I will get used to them. I like the Red Lights on them but I won't be using that at all. Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase. You can't go wrong with the price of these for playing video games.
title: Impressive Headset for Gaming

author: J. Hubbard
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2019
review_content: I bought this for my 8 year old son to talk to his cousin while playing Fortnite. He's not allowed to talk to strangers online, so I love that you can mute the microphone right from the cord instead of having to go into the game settings to mute it. It's very flexible, which is a huge plus, since my son tends to drop and break everything. Both he and I have worn the headset to play Fortnite and the sound quality is fantastic for less than $30. Also, the headset is surprisingly comfortable. Even my 4 year old likes wearing it. The lights are cool, but I need to buy a USB extension to use them. It is a little awkward having a cord plugged into the controller and another cord plugged into the back of the tv (our nearest USB input), but my son doesn't seem to mind. Overall, we're very pleased with our purchase!
title: Awesome for kids

author: Chhun Hong
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2019
review_content: I bought this headset for my nephew, who enjoys gaming a lot. Here is his opinion on it.I have been using this product for several months now and it does not disappoint. The mic quality is crystal clear, and my gaming friends noticed its high quality immediately. The ear cuffs are somewhat large, however, they are by no means uncomfortable. The volume adjustments on the cable are very convenient and so is the ability to mute the microphone whenever, with a single flip of the switch. This headset requires a USB connection for the LED lights to appear, and they look flashy and cool. The sound quality is amazing and much better than my previous headset, which cost nearly $100. The headset's noise cancellation works well and my gaming friends are unable to hear annoying background noises when I am using it. Overall, great buy for its price and would definitely recommend.
title: Great price, high quality

author: Brandon L.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2019
review_content: The sound is great, the microphone works, what more could you need from a headset? By default it has one 3.5mm headphone jack but comes with an adapter so you can plug individually into headphone and microphone ports on your PC. The headset also has a USB port that just lights up the device. I ran into some minor issues when using this and contacted their customer support. Their customer support got back to me very quickly and we were able to resolve the issue.
title: It's great for a budget headset.

author: Marie Daphney Jones
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2019
review_content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video.           Thank you so much, I love everything about my professional gaming headset, happy happy,I'm ready to make noise playing 2k19
title: I love the speaker size , I'm happy with my purchase.

author: Robert S.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2019
review_content: I’ve never been much of a gamer, but I met some people online who I started to squad up within many different games. I had been using little earbuds, which worked but would end up hurting my ears after the first hour of playing. I decided that since I was playing so much, I should invest in some headphones. I looked at a lot of different brands and read a lot of reviews. As I said, I was never much of a gamer, so I had no idea what I should be looking for. After searching for a few weeks, I came across the K2 Pro gaming headset.This headset is perfect; the mic is clear and doesn’t pick up any other noise. My friends say it is clear, and there is no background noise. The best part is when playing first-person shooter games, I can hear the footsteps in front, behind, left, and right of me before anyone else can. I am able to let my squad know where someone is coming before they light us up. One of my favorite features is being able to control the volume and the mic so easily. Times when I do not want to talk or when I go into game chat to listen to others, it makes it easy to switch my mic on and off.Even though I do not have different gaming headphones to compare these to, I have used my old beats headphones for a bit, and these are 100% better than those when gaming. I am impressed, and every gamer should get a pair. I am even trying to get my friends to buy a pair so that they can enhance their gaming to a new level.I would highly recommend these headphones to anyone hardcore gamer to the occasional gamer. The price is fantastic for the quality. I would buy these over and over again.
title: These raise your gaming experience to a new level

author: Josh K
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2019
review_content: This is a really nice headset for the price. The band across the top feels a little cheap (read: weak), but it has lasted for a couple of months of heavy usage. The bass response is great, and it has long term comfortability. The leds (if you're into that) work great, but if you don't want to use them, just don't plug in the USB cord, as the audio is via a 3.5mm jack, not USB.
title: Awesome Headset for the price

author: David
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2019
review_content: SO I used to use a simple single wire $20 gaming headset made by Hades. They were a cursed brand for me, I always broke the jack. I went through three, lol. I bought these due to the fact I was getting tied of just using skull candy earbuds for my Xbox. I found this nice headset that can be used for my PC and Xbox, at a lower cost too, so I figured, why not?- Sound Quality  The quality I am very satisfied with, including its 7.1 surround sound capabilities. It helps me in FPS shooters like Siege trying to listen for enemies. The bass in it sounds pretty good, but when I "Good" its noticeable but I like me a hearty bass from deep within my heart... Otherwise the sounds are really nice and no complaints from there.-  Comfort?  The pads on the Ears and across the scalp are actually quite comfy.  If you no life some games for like 8+ hours, its understandable when your ears are tired of being pushed back a little, so mine are small enough to tuck a bit into the speaker areal. That's where as a personal request if there could be a foam padding between the speaker and the mesh that covers it, for those who have small ears. I don't have much say, as the producer are the engineers...- Summary  Good for when you're trying for a starter gaming headset... The sound does work without the USB plugged in, you just wont get ya fancy lights. This does work with just the jack in the Xbox One S, as it is a newer controller and not needing the adapter. (Your choice if you still wish to buy the adapter if it makes you more comfortable.)
title: One of my best "Cheaper" purchases.

author: LS
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2019
review_content: For me these headphones were amazing.  But the only thing that I was disappointed about was that there are no batteries so the lights don’t work on iPad or kindle.  Another thing that I had a problem with was the size adjustment came a little lose.  But besides that I love them a lot.  The mic works amazing.  I give it a five star because I didn’t think it would be this nice.  Yes there were some problems but they are a lot nicer then other gaming headphones you can get at this price.  I would definitely say it was worth the money.We did have an issue with them but the company was quick to resolve it for us no hassle. We will get other items from them in the future on how good their service was.
title: They are amazing! / Good customer service too

author: Will
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2019
review_content: Amazing gaming headset. When I’m shopping for headsets I like to make sure that it both performs well and looks good, and this headset does both very well. Looks amazing and is very comfortable. The sound quality is very good and it has a very large range of sound volumes. The mic is adjustable and has very good quality, and it also has has a manual switch to turn the mic on and off on the little piece attached to the cord. It’s very useful for listening to normal devices and it is very great for gaming. I got it for about $27 on sale which is a great price . Definitely worth it and I would reccomend this to anyone!
title: Great looks, comfort, quality, and price!

author: Htay76
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2019
review_content: I purchased this headset for a temporary relocation situation at work. We are all sitting at tables together during a remodel, so I wanted something covering both ears with a good quality mic. Product was delivered on-time and in great shape. I made a few calls with it today using my Cisco IP Communicator and it everyone said I sounded crystal clear. Also tried it out with my Xbox with the same results. If you want a great headset at an affordable price look no further!
title: Solid affordable headset

author: Mama McGyver
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2019
review_content: I had owned a different pair of head phones for my PS4 and they broke after 2 years of service (user error). I found these headphones and bought them immediately because of the good price. They have preformed far beyond my expectations. The audio quality is unreal, creating the feeling like I am inside the game itself. In fact, I was so impressed that I started to use them to listen to music. Best pair of headphones I have ever owned!
title: Great headphones at a Good Price

author: Jay O
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2019
review_content: I bought these headphones because I was looking for a budget-friendly headset that sounded decent. However, the moment I tried them, I was surprised to find out they sounded amazing. They feel very comfortable in your head and they don't hurt your ears after long periods of use. The sound quality is crisp and have clear bass and mids. The braided cable is long, feels well built and comes with a PC Adapter. The design is very cool and I like the contrast of black and red. I definitely recommend these headphones if you are looking for a budget-friendly experience.
title: Excellent headphones at a very reasonable price

author: aratjupiter
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2019
review_content: I bought this headset after my desk mic stopped working.  The audio is super clear to the point where I'm noticing sounds in games that I've never heard before.  The mic is also really clear and does not let in much background noise.  The product arrived exactly when they said it would and was super easy to set up: just plug it in.  I would certainly buy from them again!
title: Great buy!

author: sbantner
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2019
review_content: What more can be said about this headset. I have used other mid range and high end headsets. The quality difference between those more expensive brands and the Runmus headset is 100% identical. The quality of sound is clear and crisp when needed (voice) bass is booming (background) and I can't hear my kids screaming, so this headset is a triple threat to the big guys. I will definitely recommend this headset to my other gaming friends. Psst... the LED feature is awesome too
title: Superior sound with excellent voice at a fraction of the cost of expensive brands

author: Madalynn Garcia
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2019
review_content: Excellent headset for an excellent price. With the quality of this item, it blows Turtle Beaches out of the water. The headset looks really nice, it feels comfortable on the head, and the sound is good quality. The only problem is that it needs a headset adapter for the Xbox one controller if you would like to make the volume louder, but that was to be expected. Other than that, very happy with the product and would definitely recommend.
title: Great quality for good price

author: Jake Saunders
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2019
review_content: I am a casual gamer and never really needed a headset in the past. Recently, my friends decided to start playing games together and my crappy headphone/microphone combo was not adequate. I found this headset on amazon and it had great ratings for a good price, so I bought it. My friends immediately noticed a huge improvement in the quality of my microphone. The plush ear pieces are a nice touch and do a great job of allowing me to hear everything that is going on in game. The only downside to the comfort of the headset is that the part going over my head can, at times, become uncomfortable. This may just be me, but regardless I was able to alleviate the problem each time by simply moving the headset a little more forward, or a little more backward, on my head. The volume control and setup are incredibly easy, am I could not have asked for a better product for the price.
title: Great headset

author: steve johnson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2019
review_content: My first gaming headset. You're always cautious about something that costs less than the big boy brands. This headset is everything a headset should be. It's worth way more than the cost. The way it is made is great, The ear pieces are quite comfortable, the ability to adjust to the size of your head is perfect. the set is comfortable on your head and the sound from this supposed cheap headset is truly amazing. I've used it for fortnite and a few other games and also to watch some tv just to see how it produces sound. I have no complaints about the sound or comfort of this headset, I cant compliment the sound enough on this headset.The only con I can find is the usb plug for the LED lights is about 6-8 inches long and I personally do not have anything that close to my head to plug it into and I use the black standard wireless xbox one x controller.Overall I would buy this set again and again and will be recommending this headset to all my gaming friends.
title: Awesome Headset

author: Archie D Lawyer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2019
review_content: I bought this one after my turtle beach's had gone haywire. I was not dissatisfied.-Comfort: The ear pads are very comfortable and are large enough so my (large) wars do not squish against the speakers. The band is perfect; sits on my head does not make me sweat and it does not deform. The extendable arms allow for anyone to feel comfortable. I have had this on for eight-plus hours and no problems.-Microphone has great quality and is clear (Source: Many of my squadmates and teammates.-Sound Quality: It definitely is what it says, the bass is clear and crisp while treble is not drowned out.-Set Up: As a PC user with Realtek Sound Manager (Not Required just stating I am using that software Difficulty not changed) It was very easy to set up. Plug in. Set as default devices and done.-Looks: The red LEDs pair well with my pc and just the overall style of the headphones are great all LEDs work as expected, but they clear and bright, unlike other brands.
title: Great, Low-Cost, Quality Gaming Headset (PC)

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2019
review_content: I bought these because they were highly reviewed and on the lower end for price among gaming headsets on Amazon. I'm a few weeks into using them and they work perfectly for my purposes. I'm not looking for audiophile quality from an into gaming headset, but they sound pretty good and are comfortable to wear for several hours at a time.Pros: they are low cost, feel pretty robust, sound clear, easy to use and setup, comfortable to wear for extended periods, and are compatible with PC/console straight out of the box.Cons: the design is a little awkward/bulky, but that's pretty much the model of most gaming headsets. Time will tell on quality, as I am somewhat suspicious considering the price.Bottom line for me is that they work perfectly for getting up and running with a new casual gaming hobby. I would recommend them to anyone looking to get started as well, as long as the design isn't a deal breaker.
title: Works well for my casual gaming

author: Prydan2k
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2019
review_content: Purchased this headset after my Triton Kunai's were snapped by my kids. I was looking for a headset that wasn't too expensive and with the best five star reviews. This led me to Runmus Headset. Package was received in excellent condition. So far I have been very impressed with this headset. It is much larger than my old headset, yet weighs about the same. It fits comfortably on my large head and the sound is improved. I mostly expect to use this with my PS4, but think I'll give it a try for some PC gaming too.
title: Initial Thoughts: Great Value & Quality Headset

author: Dylan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2019
review_content: Bought this as a present for my son, and was pleasantly surprised. The headset is lightweight, with soft padding on the ear cups and across the top of the head. The retractable band feels solid, offering firm resistance when lengthening or shortening for proper fit. The inside of the cups have a breathable mesh and the sound is crystal clear. The lights require a powered USB port (we use a small USB power bank since he connects the headset to an XBox controller). The headset will fit any 3.5mm jack, and even includes a splitter for hooking up to the speaker and mic jacks separately on a PC. Overall great quality for the price, and have already ordered two more.
title: Best bang for your buck

author: Virutec Computer Repair
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2019
review_content: I run a small computer repair store and only leave reviews on the things I feel meet expectations. I am giving this item a 5 star because It works great with no problems. We probably spend over $50,000 a year on Amazon for our business, so finding the right parts in a timely matter at an affordable price so I can make some profit is key. We rely on Amazon to keep us in stock with parts.
title: Virutec Computer Repair Approved.

author: LLindloff
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2019
review_content: The RUNMUS Gaming Headset is a quality headset which I would recommend to anyone looking to buy a quality headset. It has 7.1 one surround sound, which is a necessity to playing video games. It furthermore is equipped with a fantastic microphone, which allows for your communications and callouts to be crystal clear, which is vital to having a great experience in tactical games. Whether is it watching Youtube, Streaming Twitch, or just messing around with buddies, the RUNMUS gaming headset is my go-to choice headset. Although these qualities are great, perhaps the BEST thing about the RUNMUS headset is how comfortable it feels when i am gaming. It is almost like I don't know I am wearing a headset. Thanks to RUNMUS for providing such a High Quality and Beautiful headset.
title: A quality headset at a great price!

author: Michele
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2019
review_content: This is the opinion of the young man using this set of headphones:Used only for gamingPros:1. Working microphone2. Non-interference for mic3. Non-removable mic4. Still hear talking outside of headphones5. Interchangeably6. Adjustability of mic7. Led lights on itCons:1. Cord could be a little longer2. Could use a separate cord3. Led lightning cord needs to be longer
title: Great Headphones, Good Price

author: Thomas Jackson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2019
review_content: I would like to say I am very happy with this product. This headset is very comfortable to wear for long periods of time. I have even fallen asleep with it on my head listening to music. When I first opened the box I knew this was exactly what I was looking for. I have spent hundreds on headsets over the years, this is by far the best feel nice plush leather ear and head foam keeps you nice and cool. Really cool design with lights the microphone is fantastic for games like pubg and programs like discord. This product exceeded all my expectations for the price hands down beats the corsair rgb, turtle beach 300 stealth and Logitech 430. It beats them all by miles for this price this company is setting standards. I am now going to purchase all of their products for all my needs and highly recommend to anyone hardcore gaming even those on a budget who prefer quality above all else! Thank You Runmus I am a happy customer!
title: The best headset for comfort and sound for the price very satisfied!

author: Joshua Ruiz
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2019
review_content: Let's start with the presentation. As soon as I got the package and even without using it, I already liked the headset, which is something important, of course not as important as the sound, but I think if you like something visually it is a good start. After that and before testing the sound and the microphone, I tried them on me to see if it was comfortable or not and it is actually very comfy. Maybe because of the leather pads it can give you some heat, but that is a minor issue. It has a control where you can set the sound and also a button where you can activate or deactivate the microphone. Now let's move to what really matters, the sound quality!! It is actually very very good. all the sounds are sharp, so you are aware of what is going on around you.I am very happy that I bought this headset because it actually fulfilled my expectations and even surpassed them. I totally recommend this headset if you want to play games or even just to listen to music on your computer!
title: Couldn't find an issue

author: Lalasaurus
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2019
review_content: (for the people complaining about the company "bribing people with free gifts for reviews, it literally doesn't even say it has to be a positive review lol calm down. They just want feedback.)If you're trying to decide between these or another pair, do yourself a favor and buy these! Pleasantly surprised by the quality of these headphones! They sound great, seem to be pretty solidly built, and overall a great deal for the price. Would definitely recommend these!
title: Best money I've ever spent

author: Chalsea Nieman
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2019
review_content: Coming off of a hypercloud x which fell apart like a cheap piece of plastic and the chord tightened on its own despite being nylon, this headset is a nice surprise. it's by no means able to compete with higher-end headsets, but for the price it's fantastic. if your looking for a cheap-take around this one will not disappoint.(begin update) the company contacted me after writing my review, not only to make sure I was satisfied to but to let me know of future changes they planned. this email was like a friend writing to me, someone passionate about their work. i'm changing my review to 5 of 5. you cannnot get a better bang for your buck when it comes to this headset, period. if the headset itself isn't good enough, then the customer service will be.
title: Great headset for price/even BETTER customer service(UPDATED)

author: Jose R. Serrano
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2019
review_content: I got this for my child to play on Xbox one. It is very flexible and comfortable. I know because I tried it out myself. The bass is pronounced and the details are audible. She loves the light-up feature. I hooked it up to my phone and took a video to hear the quality of the mic and it did a great job isolating my voice. The sound of my voice was crisp and true to life. I loved it so much, I bought a second set for my other child.
title: Good sound, great mic

author: Jig Pandya
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2019
review_content: I bought this to use with our NS and have enjoyed the look (especially with the lights) along with the sound quality. Wish the volume could be placed a little higher but still good enough. Lights are a cool feature but don't forget you'll need to plug into a USB connection.Finally, the length of the cord is good but not long enough to reach where I'd like to sit. I bought an extension to use which is perfect in length. Just a TIP - make sure your 3.5mm male end has 3 rings NOT 2. The mic will not work unless the 3.5mm has 3 rings on the male end.Overall, I've enjoyed the product and look forward to many years of use!
title: Great headset for using with a Nintendo Switch

author: Bart
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2019
review_content: I received those as a birthday gift from my wife. At first I thought that they produce sound a bit quiet (even when every sound setting is maxed-out) but after a while i started feeling tired of war noises, loud explosions, roaring engines and so on (I'm currently playing War Thunder on Steam). Currently I play at around 50% and it's fine. Outside sounds are muffled and do not mix with game sound. Headset is not too heavy, so my neck doesn't hurt even after few hours of constant gaming. It also doesn't squeeze to much (so my ears are not irritated and/or head doesn't hurt) yet not little so they stay in place. I'm also a fan of braided cord.
title: Good quality for a good price.

author: Kindle Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2019
review_content: This headset fits great. I've had others slip anytime I've tilted my head. I use these mainly for my PS4 so the added USB power for the light doesn't get used much. I bought a USB extension when I want to hook it to my computer. Otherwise, I use a twist tie so the USB connection isn't floppy around. The volume control feels great and solid. The padding is very comfortable and helps block out sound when playing.
title: Great fit

author: Sylvus Tobin
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2019
review_content: Wow. I actually got these to double as both gaming headset and work headset, as I work from home and run a lot of client calls. I am shocked at what I got considering how low a price I paid. I just wanted something that would get me clearer call quality and work with my PS4 when I felt like doing a broadcast.Honestly, the audio quality is ten times what I'd expected, and the microphone is crystal clear. The headphones themselves are huge and heavy, definitely not your daily carry headphones by any stretch, but still very comfortable to wear for long periods of time. I feel like I've stumbled on a gem with these headphones - for the price, you can't beat them.
title: Shocked at the quality.

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2019
review_content: Once plugged in and the lights turn on - it looks great!  Had to play with the computer settings a little bit to figure out how to get the microphone going but once done, worked great.  The headphone cushions are nice and it fits good on my child's head.  The sound isn't too loud coming out of the headphone speakers which is an added bonus.  For the price this is perfect for what we need.
title: looks awesome

author: Eli
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2019
review_content: I got this headset wanting to use it to play Call Of Duty, A First-person shooter, to see which direction people were walking and shooting from. and it sure does do just that. it has improved my game so much.Don't let the size intimidate you, it is so comfortable, the cushions are soft and breathable. I could wear it all day. the longest time wearing them was about 3 hours and no problemsThe mic is clear, I listened to a recording and its pretty good.All in All i would highly recommend these. especially if you are looking to improve your gaming experience. the surround sound is unbelievably amazing. you won't regret getting this
title: AMAZING QUALITY

author: Martin Puente
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2019
review_content: I just bought this based on the fact it has over 6,000+ reviews and an average of 4.5 stars.  When I got the box and opened it up I was very impressed by the robust build of it.  I have two kids who like to use my stuff and I feel like this will take the added wear and tear they put on my electronics.  I did a quick bass and treble test and it was everything I thought it would be and more.  The sounds are crisp and clear, the ear pieces actually shake from all the base, and it does block out all other sound.  I have yet to try out the mic but it is a fixed mic that you can raise or lower, but that is a good thing as bendable microphones seem to always break.  The ear pieces and head band are extremely comfortable.  Couple of somewhat negative things.  The headset is not completely noise cancelling, I wasn't expecting it to be but just in case you need something that is completely noise cancelling.  You have to have the USB cord plugged in in order for the lights to work, and the USB cord only powers the lights.  Lastly, be sure to check if you need an adapter if you are going to be using this on a Xbox controller or PS4.
title: Great Comfort and Sound

author: AndyPanRI
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2019
review_content: Needed a new headset after my last one's microphone stopped working out of the blue. This set came up highly recommended when doing a search for the best of gaming headsets, and I was not disappointed. Pretty much plug-and-play, had it up and going in minutes, and the sound quality is excellent. While a bit heavier than my last headset, it is comfortable to wear and cancels out surrounding sound, allowing complete immersion in the game or movie being viewed. Highly recommend.
title: Excellent quality for the price

author: Dean & Pamela
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2019
review_content: This headset is awesome.  I have owned a pair of x42 wireless Turtle Beach for several years and they constantly would go dead or cut out during important moments of gameplay.  They promised to be 5.1 surround sound but never were and cost me $150.  The Runmus gaming headset is amazing.  The sound and deep bass allows you to hear every footstep of other players and the sound is so good on Xbox One that you can actually tell where it's coming from.  This headset lights up red, has a great microphone, a convenient volume control and is so comfortable and flexible yet sturdy.  Would totally purchase again.
title: Best wired headset EVER!  On XBOX ONE.

author: Jeff Tapp
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2019
review_content: We ordered this headset for our 14-year-old-son for Christmas and it has been a big hit! He loves the color and the way it looks.  It is very sharp looking! The sound is very clear, no static, and he likes that he can adjust the volume.  The microphone is movable, so he can move it up when he is not using it.  It is a very well-made headset, not flimsy at all, and is holding up extremely well. We have had no issues as we have had with other headsets in the past. Will definitely purchase again when in the market for a headset!
title: Super cool and great sound!

author: Joshua Weiss
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2019
review_content: Bought this headset for my 7 year old for Christmas - the headset looks HUGE on him, but he said it does fit him okay. It seems like it's built well - he is able to hear through the speakers and others are able to hear him. He uses it generally to play Fortnite. Sometimes he has to unplug and plug it back in, but that only happens once in awhile. Overall, it's a very good headset - it has a very large build, but seems to fit a child's head okay.
title: Good Headset

author: Jennifer  Esquivel
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2019
review_content: Like most of you reading this I was cautious about buying these as I have alway had T.B.’s before.Plus’s the cord is a very good length and feels pretty sturdy as well. The noise cancelling is passive but does cut out a lot of background noise the mic is decent have not had anyone say they can not hear me at least.Minuses the sound is good but don’t expect any hearing loss due to these.  I play with the volume at max but it is nice to be able to turn it down with a flick of my thumb.  The surround sound works as intended.  Now as for the lights... well they work but unless your playing on PC they are a mute point as the usb for the power is attached to the 3.5 mm jack that plugs into my Xbox controller so unless I run a jumper to a plug in or some sort of power source they don’t light up.  Which to me is not why I bought them.Overall I am happy with them I wanted a cheap pair that did not cost me 100+ dollars.  So for those who want a decent not Great pair of gaming head phones for less then $ 30.00 I would recommend these.  Because hey they are LESS THAN $30.00!!!!
title: Would buy again!

author: smp
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2019
review_content: These really work well. There are some great reviews already on here that cover the details about connectivity, audio quality, comfort and so on, and I would just agree with the ones that tell you what a tremendous value these are at this price point. I was really glad to have found these as the last 'budget' pair that I bought have broken and these are better in every way so maybe it was a good thing. :)
title: You can't go wrong at this price, or for quite a bit more!

author: Sarah
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2018
review_content: We bought a gaming headset and my son didn’t love it due to some technical difficulties, I rated one star and I was later contacted to get a free replacement and refund. My son is excited to get a new one and hopefully no more technical issues.
title: Good customer service

author: Norris
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2019
review_content: Sound quality is great with the 7.1 surround sound it makes it where you can really hear somebody from different angles noise cancellation is it does its job the mic keeps the volume is very low so that way it people can hear what you're saying it doesn't fatigue my ears or leave a dent in my head from wearing them half the time I don't even notice I have them on other than the fact I can't hear nobody in house and I would definitely recommend them to others for gaming and whatnot haven't really tried them on my phone yet to see how adequate they are but if there is good as they are with a gaming system then a computer system and a phone they would be superb
title: For the price these are perfect headphones

author: Dan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2019
review_content: I have had so much trouble with getting a good mic and a decent pair of headphones that I can play games with my brother over pc on and talk to him.  This headset works as advertised.  Worked instantly with Windows 10 and steam.  The sound quality is excellent.  I can hear my brother and all the sound in the game with little interruption from outside sound.  The mic is clear enough that my brother can hear me speaking without any problems and there is no feedback.  Great headset for the price.
title: Great, simple, inexpensive pc headset with mic

author: ThirdPhantom
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2019
review_content: Bought this as a birthday present for my husband. His last pair broke but he didn't want to buy another without knowing about the details. I wanted to wait until the headset was used for a few days before writing a review.He has very large dreads so I was worried about the fit over his hair while also making sure his ears were comfortable. Gratefully, it fits  with absolutely no drawbacks, and the quality is amazing for the price range.With the 3.5mm jacks, I forgot that Windows 10 likes to suppress the sound of the microphone (if you don't have an amplifier), so we ended up getting the 3.5mm --> USB adapter and now we don't need to plug in the extra USB for the headset to light up.Took a while to set everything up, but it is worth it in the end. This is a great gift if you plan on giving someone a little something for their PC.
title: Great gift

author: Jeff
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2019
review_content: These headsets are a little bigger than my other one that I had, but it is so much better. It is more comfortable on my head, both my ears, and the top of my head, so if I'm on for a long time, it doesn't hurt. The mic quality is much better, and the overall design of the headset is really good. I can hear stuff clearly in game, and it is really easy to turn the sound to what you like. Even though the USB is not for the sound and mic, it is still really cool to have a headset that lights up. Overall, my experience with these headsets is really good, and I would recommend it to anyone that needs a new headset
title: The Best Headsets I have ever had!

author: Sean
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2019
review_content: They fit well and cancel out most of the outside noise while providing clear audio quality.  The construction is surprisingly robust with the usb/mic/speaker cable being a good mix between tough yet flexible.I've worn them for a few days but no longer than 3-4 hours at a time.  With cheaper headsets my ears have been sore and my head killing me after only 30-45 minutes but these are great.  No pain after wearing them for several hours at a time.For the price you couldn't do better.  Great headset.
title: Excellent sound quality

author: Jove
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2019
review_content: My son has been after me for a headset for his gaming on an Xbox One. Reviews seed great and the price was right. We we received it I got a little nervous with howany attachments there were and when I looked at the directions I thought it might not fit our controllers. The directions indicated an adapter might be needed. But, alas, we had the newer version that has the 3.5 mm Jack.  So we plugged it in and worked perfect.the sound was good. A little quiet for this adult dad but perfect for preserving my kiddos hearing. Mic worked without a hitch and the quality was good. No complaints here. Gaming just got a lot more fun for my boy.
title: Works great for Xbox one gaming

author: John Marvin
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2019
review_content: I got these a couple days ago for a new game coming out. I have all audio-game play and chat, directed to the headaet and it is amazing. I can hear every little thing in Monster Hunter World:Iceborne. While i'm online with friends, I can hear them clearly over all the game play sounds, making this an awesome headset to have for gaming! The noise cancellation is great, and my friends say that they can clearly hear me over my mic at the most basic setting. It's comfort is great, fits over my ears nicely and doesn't feel too snug on my head. Adjustable so you can set it to where you are comfortable at. I would highly recommend someone who is an avid gamer to buy this, it is a great product and you will not be disappointed by it! I played roughly 20-25 hours this last weekend and it has been working great.
title: Amazing

author: Erik Underwood
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2019
review_content: As somebody who is new to buying headsets for online gaming, I didn't want to shell out a couple hundred dollars for a set without having much experience using them.  When I came across the reviews for the RUNMUS gaming headset on Amazon, they were incredibly positive.  As the set only cost 30 dollars it was a no brainer to me to pick them up.  A few days later and all I can say is WOW, these are a fantastic value.  The sound quality is wonderful, microphone sounds clear with no static interference, and the headphones are light enough to be worn comfortably for long sessions.  I use mine on PS4, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch.  I do not game on PC so I can't attest to the quality for that but I would surprised if it were any different from the consoles.  For anyone looking to grab an entry level headset that performs well above its price point, I highly recommend picking up a pair of these.
title: Incredible quality for a budget-priced headset

author: Ang
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2019
review_content: This product is really good. The padding on the ear part is snug, and fits like a glove. The strong wire will prevent the static from happening, which is a problem I've had in the past. The microphone base is solid, so it doesnt get to close or far from your face. The only small problem I have, is finding out how to turn on the led lights, in a way where I can still use them
title: Amazing headphones

author: mcanyucel
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2019
review_content: - The USB jack is just for lights, the sound and mic connections is a single multi-channel 3.5mm audio jack.- It comes with a splitter that converts the multi-channel jack to 1 audio and 1 mic jacks.- The environmental audio is really good. If the game supports, you can easily identify where in 3D the sound comes from.- For music, it is OK for its price. It can definitely not compare with few-hundred dollars headphones, but this is not meant for that anyway.- The microphone seems to have slight noise. It is not much, but it is there.- It has a volume controller and a mic switch (on-off) on the remote that is over the cord.- Ear pads are really comfortable, but causes sweating after some time. Some of my previous headphones' pads developed scales and just got torn in time; I hope this will endure longer.- It is a little heavy and big.
title: Very good product for the price

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2019
review_content: This gaming headset does not work for me. It is on its way back.Update: I wanna say something for their amazing aftersales service. They contacted me after that and sent me a new replacement. The new one works well!
title: Doesn't work!!!

author: Brett A. Kays
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2019
review_content: Before purchasing these, I had gone through several pairs of gaming headsets in 2 years. Like a lot of people, I don't really want to shell out a ton of money for a gaming headset, so I spent some time researching the best headset on a budget. After a month of use, I can say that these headphones outperform any other pair I've had before. Sounds are clear and loud without being distorted, and the headset itself is comfortable. Microphone quality is good, and the LED lights are a nice touch. All in all, the quality is similar, if not better, than other headsets that cost 2-3x as much. If you're looking for the most bang for your buck, I highly recommend these.
title: Great product for the price

author: Damian Rudnicki
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2019
review_content: These have been my favorite headphones thus far for gaming. This fit great and the cushions do not hut my big ears like most others. This product plugs into your ps4 controller, or into the console via USB.  I love how there is a switch to turn on/off mic and controller for volume.Also these are durable! I have gotten angry, regrettably, and threw my head set down multiple times, and still they stand! Lastly, the packaging was superb- I would highly recommend this product.
title: Excellent Headphones for a great price.

author: Anthony
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2019
review_content: Product looks just like the one displayed in the photos and video.Son destroyed his previous Turtle Beach headsets due to be extra aggro when gaming. These ones are freaking awesome and perfect for all ages. Right out the box, awesome appearance that stand out from the common Turtle Beach headsets and these come at a better price. It comes with multiple  connectors, adapters, etc. The wire length is durable and longer than the typical audio lines, very impressive.Headset is adjustable and flexible to withstand excessive use and raging outbursts from a L. Sounds is great and mic is clear, LED's are bright and add an extra touch you cant find locally that excite the kids.Overall an awesome product and outshines the common ones you can find at your local Target, Walmart, etc. highly recommend to any and all.
title: Outstanding Quality for the Price

author: Dr. Terry
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2018
review_content: The main draw for these was the price and multiple connection options. I didn't notice before getting it that it had a braided cable, so that's nice. These things look chunky and huge, but they aren't heavy and the amount of padding makes them very comfortable to wear. I can't vouch for the mic since that isn't much of a concern for me, but it's nice to have one for the rare times I'll need it. There's a switch on the cable that lets you control volume and cut the mic on and off directly. Pretty standard, but good to have. All the places where cables connect to other bits are protected with flexible plastic, and it all feels secure and durable. Haven't had it long enough to know how well the wiring itself holds up. Sound is great. Overall, absolutely fits my needs without having to spend too much.
title: Exactly what I wanted

author: lisa may
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2019
review_content: To be honest when I first bought this product I was a little unsure because of the price being so low. Even though all the reviews were really good I thought I might end up with a below average headset. Now that I have received it and used it for many hours I can truly say that I'm surprised in a good way. This headset goes beyond every expectation I had. It has great sound quality (especially the bass), it has very comfortable ear cushions that I was able to wear for hours without any ear irritation; the mic is great as well, when i talked to my friend for the first time with this headset he said that I sounded much clearer than before. The LED lights are also a nice feature but do not need to be on if you don't want them to be just simply unplug the USB. Overall I think this is a great buy.
title: Amazing quality for the price!

author: Ossie P
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2019
review_content: This RUNMUS headset certainly doesn’t feel budget at all! Any other headset you buy for this amount either breaks right away or doesn’t last long at all. Even we bought a headset more expensive, it would have probably broke too. We have been looking through headsets to buy, and we found this one. It didn’t at all look cheap, but when I put it on for the first time, it felt like an expensive gaming headset. I feel like I basically bought a headset for much less than it should have really costed. I have sent this headset to a few people too. I really do recommend this headset for people to buy.
title: RUNMUS Gaming Headset

author: Matthew
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2019
review_content: I use this headset for my PS4 and it is amazing. I love the volume control and mic mute switch on the cable because the options in the settings menu on the PS4 are way too cumbersome to adjust the volume. The sound quality is very impressive for the price. I also bought a pair of noise cancelling headphones for twice the price of these, and although they seal on my ears a little better than these, the PS4 doesn’t recognize the mic on those, which is totally fine because I am now super dependent on the volume control on the wire. These are very comfortable and are more enjoyable than listening to my PS4 through my surround sound speakers. The only thing I didn’t realize before buying them was that the lights are powered by a separate USB cable pretty close to where the 3.5mm plug is, so unless I have a portable battery pack on my lap I’m not going to be using the lights. This would work well with a PC though, and frankly I don’t really need the lights anyways. All in all, an awesome buy.
title: Love this headset with my PS4

author: Bobbi Hauger
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2019
review_content: I’m very surprised on how great these headsets are for the price. They sound amazing and ppl say my mic is very clear sounding.  If I had anything bad to say about this product. I would say the headband is kinda flimsy and the usb plug is bulking and annoying. I even have an extension for it to reach the Xbox, so It can light up. And it’s still unnecessary and I’ll probably cut the usb cord off. Their next model they should either get rid of it or have it so you can pull usb part off and on. That being said, I still love this headset and will buy again.
title: Very good headset for Xbox one!!!

author: Tali
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2019
review_content: The quality was surprisingly good and they fit very comfortably on my head without hurting my ears. The mic sounds good according to everyone on my team as well. I would highly suggest this as it is only budget in price and not quality.Thanks Run Mus for an awesome option that sounds great in both directions and doesn't cost an arm and a leg!!
title: Good quality great price

author: mwright
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2019
review_content: At first I was concerned because it wouldn’t pick up my voice on it’s microphone and the instructions could be clearer. But I watched a review of these on YouTube and I had to unplug the top of the cable then plug that into my Xbox One controller and it worked perfectly! The headset’s cord has a detachable cord, when it’s attached you can use it for I assume PC and to listen to it through your phone. But for at least Xbox One unplug the top and then plug the cord in and you’ll have no problems. I’ve gone through a couple of $80+ headsets and not ONE were of this quality and had as many strengths.
title: Payed maybe more than 4xs the amount for lesser headsets

author: Erin
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2019
review_content: I adore this headset already and I just got it today.Pros:- Great sound and mic quality- Looks cool- Very comfortable- Compatible with all platforms, I plan on switching from PS4 to PC by the end of this year so this is especially great for me!- Great price!Cons:- Wired (this doesn’t matter that much to me, but I know it can to others)- Can’t really use lights without plugging in USB. So if you’re on Xbox or PS4, you can’t really use the lights unless you’re willing to plug it in to a USB extension cord, which is what I did. Adds more wires, if you do this, which is a little annoying.This is a great product, the pros far outweigh the cons in my opinion. I definitely recommend this headset if you’re looking for a high quality headset for a good price!
title: Great product, pros far outweigh the cons.

author: Saston
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2019
review_content: I was looking for a newer headset that would replace my Logitech G430 gaming headset, which broke in half as I took off the headset to turn off my PC. I have a bit of a wide head and that Logitech G430 headset lasted 2 months before that happened.Now I found this and it was more affordable than the Logitech G430. Plus it looked cooler and it had LED lights. To be honest it’s more comfortable and very much close to par with other headsets that are within the 40 to 50 dollar range. The sound is clear and the mic quality is very good according to other players especially those who trash talk others for having crappy mics. It was well complimented by them.I’d recommend this and prefer to buy it again for the mic quality and sound.
title: Comfortable, flexible, great sound and mic quality

author: Tau
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2019
review_content: Bought these neededing something that had good sound quality and wouldn't break after 3 uses. These headphones not only work great but also feel well made. The one thing I could see people having a problem with is how big they are. They are as big as they seem in the photos, but it is not a problem for me since I am using them at my desk. Great Buy!
title: Great quality for the price

author: Aaron D
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2019
review_content: Amazon's delivery service really sucks!!! I was about to send this headset to my nephew but they just threw the parcel at our gate and the package received broken. Very Disappointed!Update:  Glad that my nephew still loves this great headset even though the box is broken.
title: Need improvements!

author: Woody S.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2019
review_content: This product is absolutely amazing.  Upon ordering it, I had minimal expectations for the quality overall.  However, after trying it out gaming, I was amazed.  Not only is the sound quality off the charts, the microphone quality is amazing as well.  When playing co-op games, my teammates were able to hear me clearly and loudly.  On top of that, the headset is very well built.  It is very solid and comfortable, and not made from some cheap plastic.  The braided cable is also very long and durable.  They completely surround my ear and I enjoy hours of comfort while gaming.  As I play on PC, the included splitter for microphone and audio is very useful.  To even make this product greater than it already is, there is lighting!  Overall, this product exceeded all of my expectations and I look forward to continuing to use it.
title: AMAZING FOR GAMING!

author: Lawrence Cordero
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2019
review_content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video.           Honestly I got more than my money's worth when I bought these. They are super comfy, the cord is braided, the sound quality blows anything in its price range straight out of the dirt. They could easily mark the price of these up by 25% and it would make sense. It truthfully does belong in a higher price range, and am glad I grabbed a pair before the manufacture realizes the same.Edit: The cord is starting to short out and i have only had the headset for a slightly over a month. Thats the only reason I dropped the rating. I was initially impressed with the quality of these headphones. I was offered a free gift for my review, so it was in a way bought and the time it seemed honest but after actual use I realized why the price is so low, and why theres so many positive reviews for a subpar headset.
title: Must buy. (Maybe)

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2019
review_content: Honestly this is not a hard review to do because I am soooo overly pleased ! They are for my kids and myself and my kids have been loving it , I love the comfort the size and of course the sound! That fact I can fix the volume is also so nice and turning off my mic instead of the whole thing and dirk hear other players is also a huge win! I got these during prime and again I’ll say this ,,, soooo worth it ! I need a second pair !
title: ID BUY ANOTHER

author: tecmonkee
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2019
review_content: These headphones are great and they look great as well. Using then, even better, friends can here me loud and clear with the quality of the mic being excellent. RGB lights are are awesome. Build quality appears solid and will last. Great buy no doubt. Noise cancelling is not something I was concerned about especially for the price. It's passive noise cancelling with solid cupping around the ears.
title: Mic is quality, sound is great!

author: Gaming Headset
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2019
review_content: We bought the RUNMUS Gaming Headset Xbox, and stereo headset adapter to connect to the wireless controller.  Our son is a happy 9-year-old, he was able to put everything together to enjoy playing games with his friends.  The red and black headset is soft on his ears and allows him to hear and speak clearly to other gamers through the microphone.  The red led light allows our son to play like he is one of the gamers.  I would recommend this product for any kid who loves to play video games with friends.  The sound quality is great and allows the boys to play interacting with each other, and not over speaker phone which sends all the voices through the house.  The gaming headset has provided our son and the house with nice gaming experience.
title: RUNMUS Gaming Headset

author: Alejandro Sierra
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2019
review_content: The obvious factor here for me was the price, but when I put mine on and tested the sound, I was very impressed. People in group said the mic sounded great with no problems. This really made gaming sessions much better, so get it already!
title: looks great, fits great, and sounds great

author: Michael Shore
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2019
review_content: These headphones actually exceeded my expectations. The sound quality is actually super good and clear. Also even though it looks a bit heavy and clunky it is actually comfortable on my head they ear pieces even fit over my ears which is rare since I have big ears. The LED lights are really cool i just wish I didn't have to use a usb port for them but its not really needed for the use of it. The cord is the same rope cord that you see on the durable phone chargers so I am guessing it will last quite a while. The only issues that I see are that it changes my voice a little bit from my normal one and the microphone picks up stuff that I am listening to through them but its not super loud. Overall 5/5 for the price of this headset if it costed more I would of been a little less lenient but its still a superb headset
title: Very good for the price

author: E Strange
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2019
review_content: For the price, this exceeded my expectations by far. I’ve been eyeing headsets for gaming so I can play better by hearing footsteps, directional gunfire, etc. but didn’t want to pay $100+ for anything. Took a chance on these and wow! Couldn’t ask for more. Perfect surround sound to hear enemies approaching and firing. Do yourself a favor and just buy them, you’ll be glad you did.
title: Perfect gameplay

author: Louis Chiarelli
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2019
review_content: My kids say that it hurts their ears, because it feels like the headset is tightening on the heads the longer they wear them. Myself I thought they fit fine. The appears to be of good sound quality, but I haven't listened to any other headset that have the 7.1 sound and it's nice having the volume control in-line with the headset. As for the noise cancellation I have to agree with my kids that you can still hear everything going on around you. Overall the headset does seem of good quality.
title: Overall rating of this product

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2019
review_content: Was a little hesitant at first since the headset was pretty affordable.....but these are great! Way better than my old headset which I paid almost tripled the price of these. Using it for my ps4 and my PC. Loving the sound quality and great voice pick up. Noise cancelling is great too. The chord is super long which I dont mind at all. Can't think of any negatives with this headset. The ear covers are pretty comfy that breath nice as well.
title: Great Buy!!!!

author: Terrien2
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2018
review_content: I use this headset for gaming and listening to music. I immediately listened to a few some and the sound was great. These are very comfortable. Also, I REALLY like the durability because my twin sons can be a little rough on electonics. Overall, these have great sound, durability and a great price.
title: Comfortable and durable with great sound!

author: jewels k
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2019
review_content: I have had these for a few months now. They are used by a ten year old who is very hard on headsets. They are awesome. They are heavy compared to other sets. The quality is much much higher than the Sades ones we’ve had in the past. I’m very pleased and surprised by the way they are lasting. Absolutely no problems at all after almost constant use. My child lives in these things. He uses them with his xbox one and i phone. Don’t hesitate to purchase!
title: Durable!

author: Kindlekid
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2019
review_content: The sound quality is alright. Is it any better than any other 30 dollar headset on the market? Not really. But these headphones are the most uncomfortable headphones I've ever worn. Heavy as bricks, and hotter than hell itself. I might take them skiing with me because there is no way any measure of heat is escaping these bad boys. They dont have any sort of pivot point on the headphone, which prevents them from fitting comfortably. The build quality is horrendous. They feel like they are made of the cheapest plastic money can buy, and are incredibly flimsy. A solid sneeze could turn these things to confetti. If I had any advice to people considering these headphones, spend the extra 20 bucks and get a decent pair of turtle beaches or something.
title: Uncomfortable

author: KL
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2019
review_content: This comfortable, sturdy headset is amazingly good, especially for the price. The sound quality from the headphones and mic are clear, and brings you right into the game space, while the isolating earphone design and active noise cancellation do a good job of keeping outside noises out of the game. I've tried these on a gaming PC and a PS4 and they are great, even after hours of gameplay. Solid quality throughout. I would buy these again.
title: Solid Gaming Headset

author: NaturallyNadrah
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2019
review_content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video.           Do not buy this. For whatever reason, whenever I plug the headset into my stock PS4 controller, my thumbstick always has an input to the left (as seen in the video I provided) for that reason alone I strongly strongly suggest to not get this/return it as soon as you can.
title: Messes with your contoller

author: Scott Roberts
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2019
review_content: The low frequency sounds over-power the high frequencies.  It's way too much "boom boom boom". My kids and I found it intolerable. It makes even polite love songs almost like torture.  Like others have said, the volume is severely restricted.  You can max out your PC volume, the youtube volume, and the volume control on this and the volume is strong.  But if you need to listen to video that was recorded on a quiet level, you do not have the same volume as $5 ear bud headphones.  There does not appear to be any active noise cancellation.  My kids and I rather use the $5 ear buds we've been using.
title: Sound is very poor quality

author: Gina Marie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2018
review_content: Holy crap. I have never had a headset like this. The sound is crystal clear it's amazing. I use it for the xbox one and it has totally changed my gaming. I used it too to watch netflix while my boyfriend was playing a game in the same room... DO NOT WATCH A SCARY MOVIE WITH THESE ON. Between the noise cancelation and surround sound I thought my heart was going to stop I was so scared. Love this headset!!!
title: Best!!

author: Dennis
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2019
review_content: I purchased this based on the reviews I read about it. It is cheaply made and does not work. I purchased one and when it arrived, I plugged it in immediately — I could hear nothing but static and cracking. I requested a replacement and received it. The replacement crackled WORSE than the first one I received. I have other headsets that do work — so I know it was nothing wrong with my controller, just a cheaply made headset.
title: Cheaply Made & Not Functional — Don’t Trust 5 Star Reviews!!!

author: Joker J
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2019
review_content: So I'm changing my review on this. I purchase this about a month ago and it worked kinda. The USB for the lights and the aux cord for the headset are awfully close which makes it damn near impossible to have the led lights on while your gaming/streaming. Plus the Aux cord itself kept causing scratching noises in the earpiece which was heard by fellow gamers.The cushion on it is fantastic and very comfortable.It came with a splitter for two different sizes Aux Jack's which is good.If you have the newer xbox ones you dont need the adapter which also is good.The main reason why I changed my review from 4 to 2 Is because the customer support "bribes" you to change it to 5 stars with a free gift.Attached is the email asking me to change my original review to 5 stars.To me that takes away the honesty of these reviews and makes me wonder how many reviews are facts and how many is as a bribe to get a free gift.I have since gotten a new headset that works WAAAAY Better than this one.
title: Decent if you like bribes

author: Mohammad Moaddab
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2019
review_content: First off when I got in my package, the box the headset was in was bulging like it was shoved into the box. Upon inspection, there were fingerprints all over the glossy areas of the headset and one side of was extended while the other was not. This shows signs of use. When I purchased this item I thought it was brand new.I tested the headset and the quality of the sound was horrid, everything was crackling.I'm sorry but I cannot recommend ANYTHING from this brand especially when they try to pull one over on you like this
title: Misleading description, not always brand new?

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2018
review_content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my son. Not even a full day and it broke! Super disappointed!!
title: Broke, not even 24hrs after opening.

author: L Raatz
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2018
review_content: I bought this headset specifically to use for team play on my PS4.  I've actively used this headset for about two weeks.Pros:The sound quality is good for both gameplay and chats.The mic is clear and moves up and down easily.The price is good for casual play.The mute and volume are easily accessible.Cons:The headset is a little bulky, took some getting used to but not a deal breaker.The smallest setting is a little big for my female head. I think my head is average size, but I have to tilt the headset forward to make it comfortable.The USB attached to the headset gets in the way and can't be connected to a console controller.Overall its been a good set, but I will most likely change it out for something more comfortable.
title: Get what you expect for the price.

author: BrycenM
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2020
review_content: I ordered these for my sons gaming computer build. When they arrived I read the instructions and then plugged them into his computer. I was not able to get sound to come out so I checked device manager.. no listing showed for this headset. I chalked this up to a bad pair and sent these back for an exact replacement as my son really wanted this headset.Unfortunately the replacement pair I received did not work either. Multiple computers would not recognize this headset, no sound was able to be heard and the mic was not working. The lights on the headset were on though! We attempted to plug this in to every USB slot available, USB 2, USB 3, just line in/out nothing would actually make this gaming headset work.After all these reviews on this product it is hard for me to believe that I was unlucky enough to receive two defective headsets back to back but alas that seems to be my luck.I have returned this item and decided to go with the Vanko Gaming Headset - https://amzn.to/2UtF8oM. Worked right out of the box and have had no issues. Beautiful sound quality!
title: Could not get the headset to work

author: Michael
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2020
review_content: First thing, the sound is extremely low on these. They don't go very high, voices are muffled over the low frequencies of everything else.Second, these do not have really any sound canceling qualities to them. I have music playing on the loudest it can go with my window open and I can still hear the cars driving by on my street.Third, the surround sound is bad. There is no way to activating the surround sound in settings either. It might have it builtin, so it could be an error on my part but it's extremely uneventful.Fourth, the only good thing about these is the mic. I'm actually scared to adjust the sides because of how hard and also flimsy the plastic is.Really surprised these weren't broken since they weren't in a protective box. Can't really blame the company for that but I'm just very unimpressed overall by the quality of these headphones. It seems they put more money into the mic than anything else. I will more than likely be returning these. They definitely are not worth the price.
title: The sound is a joke, the mic is the only good thing.

author: Xianjun Pei
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2019
review_content: I bought this Headphone to have online conference. I hope both the speaker and the microphone works. There are in total 3 plugin port for this headphone: USB, speaker and microphone. However, only the speaker microphone works. Neither USB nor microphone port works. I try different setup on my computer, but when I plug in the USB, the computer cannot recognize the device. I tried my friend's very old microphone, it has usb and works. But this new one never works.At first, I thought it may be my computer problems, but I tried different computers, the headphone does not work for any computer.
title: USB does not work at all

author: Corey Neil wyant meier
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2019
review_content: Trash. I got this for a girl I was talking to that needed a new headset. The lights do not work. The sound is fair .
